resources.string: Have you backed up your Key?
You will need it to enter your vault. Keep it in a safe place. If you lose it, you can no longer enter your vault.

You can store up to %1$s of your files on our encrypted backup node for free. If you reach the limit, files will be stored only locally.
Щоб заощадити місце на вашому локальному пристрої, ви можете вивантажити всі ваші файли на наш зашифрований вузол резервного копіювання. Файли будуть завантажені назад, коли ви їх відкриєте.

Failed to update space icon. Please try again.

Once you request your vault to be deleted, you have 30 days to cancel this request. After 30 days, your encrypted vault data is permanently removed from the backup node, you won\'t be able to sign into Anytype on new devices.

We\'re sorry to see you go. Once you request your vault to be deleted, you have 30 days to cancel this request. After 30 days, your encrypted vault data is permanently removed from the backup node.

If you don\'t have one just go to anytype.io and sign up to the waiting list. We are inviting people on the rolling bases.
With Anytype you can write notes and documents, manage tasks, share files and save important content from the web.
Some of your data was managed in a newer version of Anytype.\nPlease update the app to work with all your docs and the latest features.
It\'s stored on your device and nobody will know about it until you share it!
You\'ll need it to sign in. Keep it in a safe place. If you lose it, you can no longer access your vault.

Don\'t forget to take and save your Key
You can always find the phrase in the settings on the dashboard screen.
If you lose the Key and get logged out you will not be able to ever access your data again. Save this Key outside of Anytype for data recovery.
Всі медіафайли, що зберігаються в Anytype буде видалено з вашого поточного пристрою. Вони можуть бути завантажені знову з резервної копії вузла або з іншого пристрою.

Understanding how people use Anytype helps us improve the product. This version of Anytype includes the analytics code that protects your privacy.\nIt doesn\'t record the actual document\'s content but still allows us to understand how you use Anytype.\nStay subscribed to our mailing list, as we will soon announce a new release that enables you to opt-out.
This vault is planned for deletion in %1$d days
This vault is planned for deletion tomorrow
This vault is planned for deletion today
This vault is planned for deletion in ? days
Are you sure to delete your vault?
You will be logged out on all other devices. You will have 30 days to recover it. Afterwards it will be deleted permanently.

Types are like categories that help you group and manage your objects.
All objects are connected. Use properties to build connections between objects.
Try creating new one or search for something else
Something went wrong. Please, try again later.
If you don\'t have one just go to anytype.io\nand sign up to the waiting list.
It is an encrypted location for everything you create. Everything is stored on your device, and backed up to the distributed network.
It replaces login and password. Keep it safe — only you responsible for your data. You can find this Key later in app settings.
You can find this key later in app settings
Your key is represented by a recovery phrase — 12 random words that generate your vault on this device.
Whoever has the key, has access
Anyone who knows these words can access your vault. Right now, you are the only person in the world who knows them.
All computational resources on Earth are not enough to break in. If you lose your key, it cannot be recovered. Store it somewhere safe — in a password manager or written down on paper.
All computational resources on Earth are not enough to break in. If you lose it, it cannot be recovered. So, store it somewhere safe!
The easiest way to store your Key is to save it in your password manager.
Найнадійніший спосіб - записати його на папері й зберігати в надійному і безпечному місці.

Share this invite link so that others can join your Space. Once they click your link and request access, you can set their access rights.
Only already invited members have access
People with link can edit and write in chat
People with link can view and read chat
Owner must approve each join request
The current link will stop working.
If you turn off sharing or switch to manual approval, your existing link will be deactivated. A new one will be created if you re-enable it.
Anyone with the link will be able to edit the space content.
Anyone with the link will only be able to view the space content.
Anyone with the link will need to request access to join the space.
Private comment for a space owner
Once the space owner approves your request, you\'ll join the space with the access rights owner determined.
You\'ve been invited to join %1$s, created by %2$s
You will receive a notification when the space owner will approve your request.
Hang tight — we’re setting things up for you. This should only take a moment.
You\'ve been invited to join %1$s space, created by %2$s. Send a request so space owner can let you in.
Participants will no longer sync to this space and the share link will be deactivated.
This space will be removed from your devices and you will no longer have access to it
Create invite link to share space and add new members
Please provide the link to the person you\'d like to collaborate with.
Show this QR code to the person you\'d like to collaborate with.
By clicking the link, a person requests to join the space.
After approving the request, you can choose the access rights for that person.
New members won’t be able to join the space. You can generate a new link anytime.
You are already a member of this space
Read-only access. Contact space owner for changes.
%1$s joined %2$s space with read-only access rights
%1$s joined %2$s space with edit access rights
Your request to join the %1$s space has been approved with read-only access rights. The space will be available on your device soon.
Your request to join the %1$s space has been approved. The space will be available on your device soon.
Your request to join the %1$s space has been approved with edit access rights. The space will be available on your device soon.
The space \"%1$s\" is no longer accessible.
You have been removed from the space \"%1$s\", or the space was deleted by the owner.
Your access rights were changed to read-only in the %1$s space.
Your access rights were changed to edit in the %1$s space.
Your request to join the %1$s space has been declined.
Object is not available. Ask the owner to share it.
1. Tap the Space widget to access settings
3. Generate an invite link and share it
You will have to send join request again
The link you are using does not seem to work. Please ask the owner to share a new one with you.
The invitation link could not be parsed. It may contain errors in the format or invalid data.
It looks like the space has been deleted. Please ensure that your devices are synchronized.
Досягнута межа для цього простору. Будь ласка, оновіть ваш членство або зверніться до служби підтримки за допомогою.
Схоже, що простір більше не спільний. Переконайтеся, що ваші пристрої синхронізовані.
Упс! Запит не вдалося виконати. Будь ласка, перевірте підключення до Інтернету і спробуйте ще раз.
This link does not seem to work
This invite link is no longer valid because the space was not found.
Joining Anytype network means contributing to its story
As a valued member your voice matters! Engage in exclusive events, shape strategic choices, and influence our roadmap.
Members enjoy higher backup storage & sync limits, invitations for multiple guests to collaborate in shared spaces, and a unique identity on the Anytype Network.
Your contribution supports our team and endorses our vision of a user-owned, secure, and collaborative digital network.
Our network\'s value exceeds the sum of its parts. Your membership sustains the infrastructure for its growth which underpins this network.
Dive into the network and enjoy the thrill of one-on-one collaboration
Unlock the magic of multi-party collaboration and enjoy top-notch support
Support our adventure and unlock exclusive access and perks
Membership tailored to your specific needs and preferences
Would you like to use Anytype for business, education, etc.?
This is your unique name on the Anytype network, confirming your Membership. It acts as your personal domain and cannot be changed.
This name [%1$s] is up for grabs!
Dive into the network and enjoy the thrill of one-on-one collaboration

Hi Anytype Support Team,

- Error Message: %1$s

Thank you for your assistance in resolving this issue.


Best regards,

We\'re laying the groundwork for our new chats. Including counters, notifications and other features needed for smooth chat experience.
It might take a little while, but don\'t worry, your data is safe.

During this update, your data remains fully secure. The update is performed directly on your device, and your synced data remains unaffected. We’ll just copy it to a new format, and a local backup will be created on your device, containing all your data in the previous format.
The reason we’re retaining this backup is to debug and assist you, in case of unforeseen.
You\'ll see a loading screen during the update. Once finished, you can continue using the app normally.
This layout differs from the type\'s default. Reset to match?

To scan QR codes, Anytype needs access to your camera. This permission is only used for scanning QR codes.
To scan QR codes, you need to allow camera access in your device settings.
